name: @remirage/secure-log
description: A utility for logging sensitive information securely by replacing specified values with asterisks.

scripts.pub: git add . && git commit -m "Updates" && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.pub2: tsc && git add . && git commit -m "Updates" && npm version patch && npm run build && npm publish && git push
